+@name: Pokémon the Movie: Secrets of the Jungle

info.+content: Pokémon the Movie: Secrets of the Jungle
Il film Pokémon - I segreti della giungla
La película Pokémon: Los secretos de la selva
Pokémon, o Filme: Segredos da Selva
劇場版ポケットモンスター ココ

Okoya Forest is a Pokémon paradise protected by strict rules that forbid outsiders from setting foot inside. Koko is a boy who was raised by Pokémon and also considers himself as one, treating the Mythical Pokémon Zarude as his father. Ash and Pikachu encounter Koko during an adventure.
"Fushigi na Fushigi na Ikimono" by Tortoise Matsumoto
ポケモン映画公式サイト「劇場版ポケットモンスター ココ」
